- Completed Engineering of University graduate. - Expert for IT Engineering but not limited to. - Deep knowledge of Windows Server 2008, 2013, Windows XP, 7, 8. - Proficiency with MS Word, Excel, PowerPoint and Outlook - Knowledge of network services. - 3 year relevant IT experience. - Microsoft certifications would be advantageous. - Fluent in written & spoken English.

- To manage Windows Server: internet, DHCP, DNS… - To manage network equipment (Firewall, switch, router, ADSL…) - Maintains and administer computers and related computing environments including computer hardware, software, applications software, and all configurations. - To solve IT’s problem (hardware, software) and setup software. - Backup data period. - Work as a part of Administration Sect.
